content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":252112,"originalJapaneseLine":"それより、その後ろの女の子達、その子達も同じように元気で優秀かな","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, the girls behind them—are they equally lively and talented?"},{"lineNumber":252113,"originalJapaneseLine":"楽しみ、じゅるり","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking forward to it, *slurp*"},{"lineNumber":252114,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘は時間切れで終わります。","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle ends due to time running out."},{"lineNumber":252115,"originalJapaneseLine":"アレフガルドが報告、ゼスの主力部隊が迫っています。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alefgard reports: Zeth's main forces are approaching."},{"lineNumber":252116,"originalJapaneseLine":"こちらの直衛部隊は壊滅していますので、防げません","translatedEnglishLine":"Our escort unit has been destroyed, so we cannot defend it."},{"lineNumber":252117,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサ様が負ける事はありませんがお疲れになりますよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa-sama will not lose, but she will get tired."},{"lineNumber":252118,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここはいったん引かれた方が・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It would be better to withdraw for now..."},{"lineNumber":252119,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、そうねとメディウサは引く事を決意","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, yes... Medusa decides to retreat."},{"lineNumber":252120,"originalJapaneseLine":"じゃ・・どれかおみあげを１つ２つと・・ランスの女達を値踏み","translatedEnglishLine":"Then... let’s take one or two souvenirs... evaluating Lance’s women."},{"lineNumber":252121,"originalJapaneseLine":"逃がすかーとランスが斬りかかる","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Won’t let you escape!\" Lance slashes at them."},{"lineNumber":252122,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ・・もうとメディウサがランスを石化させる","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... already—Medusa turns Lance to stone."},{"lineNumber":252123,"originalJapaneseLine":"せっかちな子ね、あっ・・そうだ、いい事おもいついた","translatedEnglishLine":"Impatient child, huh? Ah... I just thought of something good."},{"lineNumber":252124,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス君をおみあげにしようと石化したランスを取り上げる","translatedEnglishLine":"She takes the petrified Lance, deciding to make him a souvenir."},{"lineNumber":252125,"originalJapaneseLine":"これもらってかえって家でゆっくりと壊そうかな、うひっ","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe I’ll take this back home and slowly break it, hehe."},{"lineNumber":252126,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィル他が止めようとすると","translatedEnglishLine":"When Seere and others try to stop her,"},{"lineNumber":252127,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサは、へー　この男、案外人望があるんだ、それとももてるのかな","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa says, “Heh, this man surprisingly has some popularity, or maybe he’s charming.”"},{"lineNumber":252128,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふーん、面白いね、ケイブリスの元に持っていくのは1週間待ってあげるよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, interesting. I’ll wait one week before taking him to Kebris."},{"lineNumber":252129,"originalJapaneseLine":"あいつの所に持っていったら１００％すぐに壊されるからね","translatedEnglishLine":"If I take him there, he’d definitely be destroyed immediately."},{"lineNumber":252130,"originalJapaneseLine":"それまでに助けたかったら、おいで","translatedEnglishLine":"If you want to save him by then, come to me."},{"lineNumber":252131,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、その子はもういらないから帰すわ。と半身不随のリズナを放り投げる","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, I don’t need that girl anymore, so I’ll send her back."},{"lineNumber":252132,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィル他、リズナを介抱している所に","translatedEnglishLine":"While Seere and others are nursing Rizna,"},{"lineNumber":252133,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス軍（マジック、千鶴子、毛利？）が現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Zeth army (Magic, Chizuruko, Mouri?) appears."},{"lineNumber":252134,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサは・・逃げられた、ランスをさらわれたって・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa: ...They escaped, and Lance was taken..."},{"lineNumber":252135,"originalJapaneseLine":"リズナはかろうじて生きているが、あまりにもひどい惨状。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rizna is barely alive, but in an extremely awful state."},{"lineNumber":252136,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう二度と自立した生活は不可能、寝たきり障害者","translatedEnglishLine":"She will never be able to live independently again, bedridden and disabled."},{"lineNumber":252137,"originalJapaneseLine":"これからどうするの・・絶望","translatedEnglishLine":"What do we do now... utter despair."},{"lineNumber":252138,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ここからシィル視点の展開となります）","translatedEnglishLine":"(From here, the perspective shifts to Seere.)"},{"lineNumber":252139,"originalJapaneseLine":"現在地の表記のみ","translatedEnglishLine":"Only the current location display."},{"lineNumber":252140,"originalJapaneseLine":"\"ゼス１／合戦２\"　現在位置（マーク）","translatedEnglishLine":"‘Zeth 1 / Battle 2’ Current position (marker)."},{"lineNumber":252141,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス司令部に戻って","translatedEnglishLine":"Return to the Zeth command post."},{"lineNumber":252142,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスを助けにいかねばとみんな思うが、リズナを見ると怖くなる","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone thinks we must go save Lance, but seeing Rizna frightens them."},{"lineNumber":252143,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな中、シィルが率先して動く、ヒロインとして見せ場","translatedEnglishLine":"Amidst this, Seere takes the lead—her moment as the heroine."},{"lineNumber":252144,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルさんどこに行くの？","translatedEnglishLine":"Seere-san, where are you going?"},{"lineNumber":252145,"originalJapaneseLine":"私、いかないといけません。と一人でもいこうとする","translatedEnglishLine":"I have to go. She tries to go alone."},{"lineNumber":252146,"originalJapaneseLine":"次に動くのはマジック","translatedEnglishLine":"Next to move is Magic."},{"lineNumber":252147,"originalJapaneseLine":"それら釣られるように他のキャラも立ち上がる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Other characters are roused as if pulled along."},{"lineNumber":252148,"originalJapaneseLine":"リア　奴隷の分際で何かっこつけているのよ、リアのダーリンよ、リアが助ける","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria: Acting all cool like a slave, but I’m Ria’s darling, so I’ll save him."},{"lineNumber":252149,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに恩をうるチャンスねとか理由づける者も","translatedEnglishLine":"Some justify it as a chance to earn favor from Lance."},{"lineNumber":252150,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、メディウサの司令部。","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at Medusa’s command post."},{"lineNumber":252151,"originalJapaneseLine":"（前回いた位置より少し下がった所に作った新設）","translatedEnglishLine":"(A newly established post slightly behind where she was previously.)"},{"lineNumber":252152,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサ、アレフガルド、そして石化したランスが置かれている","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa, Alefgard, and the petrified Lance are there."},{"lineNumber":252153,"originalJapaneseLine":"さすがメディウサ様、お見事なプランです","translatedEnglishLine":"As expected of Medusa-sama, a brilliant plan."},{"lineNumber":252154,"originalJapaneseLine":"そう、ふふふ","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, hehehe."},{"lineNumber":252155,"originalJapaneseLine":"このヒーロー君の彼女達、みーんな私欲しいの、強い子たくさんいるから","translatedEnglishLine":"I want all these girls of this hero guy, since many are strong."},{"lineNumber":252156,"originalJapaneseLine":"遊び甲斐あるだろうしね","translatedEnglishLine":"They should be fun to play with."},{"lineNumber":252157,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、あの時、一人か二人はさらえたかしもしれないけど","translatedEnglishLine":"Though back then, maybe I could have kidnapped one or two."},{"lineNumber":252158,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんなは無理だったからね","translatedEnglishLine":"But taking them all was impossible."},{"lineNumber":252159,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、このヒーロー君をここに置いていたら、きっと来るわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"But if I leave this hero guy here, surely they'll come."},{"lineNumber":252160,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな娘達よ、律儀で一途だわ・・・いじめがいある。わくわく","translatedEnglishLine":"Such girls, loyal and single-minded... they’re worth teasing. Exciting!"},{"lineNumber":252161,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス、西部の山脈","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth, western mountain range."},{"lineNumber":252162,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサの新しい司令部がそこにあると知り","translatedEnglishLine":"Having learned that Medusa’s new command post is there,"},{"lineNumber":252163,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィル達がやってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Seere and the others arrived."},{"lineNumber":252164,"originalJapaneseLine":"２万の魔軍が待ち構えていた、魔物将軍は彼女らはメディウサ様の","translatedEnglishLine":"20,000 demon troops were waiting; the demon general ordered his troops that these girls are sacrifices for Medusa-sama."},{"lineNumber":252165,"originalJapaneseLine":"生け贄だ、丁重にもてなすのだぞと部下に命じて居る","translatedEnglishLine":"They are sacrifices—treat them carefully, he ordered his subordinates."},{"lineNumber":252166,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍はシィル達に気がついても攻める事もなく、ただ山脈の道を空けて待っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Though the demon army notices Seere and company, they do not attack but simply keep the mountain path open and wait."},{"lineNumber":252167,"originalJapaneseLine":"待ち構えているわね、でもいくしかない","translatedEnglishLine":"They’re lying in wait, but there’s no choice but to proceed."},{"lineNumber":252168,"originalJapaneseLine":"死体がいっぱい吊されている、びびる子も多数　でも行くしかない","translatedEnglishLine":"Many corpses hang from the trees; many kids are frightened, but they have to move forward."},{"lineNumber":252169,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、魔軍　シィル達が通った後、","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, after Seere and the others passed,"},{"lineNumber":252170,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は道を閉じる・・もう袋のネズミだ、あいつらは生きて戻れない","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army blocks the path... they’re trapped like rats in a sack, no way out alive."},{"lineNumber":252171,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物達はニタニタしている、メディウサに手を出すなとは言われているが、メディウサ様が","translatedEnglishLine":"The monsters grin slyly; they’ve been told not to lay hands on Medusa, but Medusa-sama..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより、その後ろの女の子達、その子達も同じように元気で優秀かな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, the girls behind them—are they equally lively and talented?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽しみ、じゅるり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking forward to it, *slurp*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘は時間切れで終わります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle ends due to time running out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルドが報告、ゼスの主力部隊が迫っています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alefgard reports: Zeth's main forces are approaching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらの直衛部隊は壊滅していますので、防げません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our escort unit has been destroyed, so we cannot defend it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサ様が負ける事はありませんがお疲れになりますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa-sama will not lose, but she will get tired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはいったん引かれた方が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would be better to withdraw for now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、そうねとメディウサは引く事を決意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, yes... Medusa decides to retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ・・どれかおみあげを１つ２つと・・ランスの女達を値踏み
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then... let’s take one or two souvenirs... evaluating Lance’s women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃がすかーとランスが斬りかかる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Won’t let you escape!" Lance slashes at them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・もうとメディウサがランスを石化させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... already—Medusa turns Lance to stone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかちな子ね、あっ・・そうだ、いい事おもいついた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Impatient child, huh? Ah... I just thought of something good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス君をおみあげにしようと石化したランスを取り上げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She takes the petrified Lance, deciding to make him a souvenir.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これもらってかえって家でゆっくりと壊そうかな、うひっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I’ll take this back home and slowly break it, hehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル他が止めようとすると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Seere and others try to stop her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサは、へー　この男、案外人望があるんだ、それとももてるのかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa says, “Heh, this man surprisingly has some popularity, or maybe he’s charming.”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふーん、面白いね、ケイブリスの元に持っていくのは1週間待ってあげるよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, interesting. I’ll wait one week before taking him to Kebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつの所に持っていったら１００％すぐに壊されるからね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I take him there, he’d definitely be destroyed immediately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまでに助けたかったら、おいで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to save him by then, come to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、その子はもういらないから帰すわ。と半身不随のリズナを放り投げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I don’t need that girl anymore, so I’ll send her back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル他、リズナを介抱している所に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Seere and others are nursing Rizna,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス軍（マジック、千鶴子、毛利？）が現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Zeth army (Magic, Chizuruko, Mouri?) appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサは・・逃げられた、ランスをさらわれたって・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa: ...They escaped, and Lance was taken...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リズナはかろうじて生きているが、あまりにもひどい惨状。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rizna is barely alive, but in an extremely awful state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう二度と自立した生活は不可能、寝たきり障害者
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She will never be able to live independently again, bedridden and disabled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからどうするの・・絶望
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What do we do now... utter despair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ここからシィル視点の展開となります）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (From here, the perspective shifts to Seere.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在地の表記のみ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only the current location display.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ゼス１／合戦２"　現在位置（マーク）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Zeth 1 / Battle 2’ Current position (marker).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス司令部に戻って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return to the Zeth command post.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを助けにいかねばとみんな思うが、リズナを見ると怖くなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone thinks we must go save Lance, but seeing Rizna frightens them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな中、シィルが率先して動く、ヒロインとして見せ場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amidst this, Seere takes the lead—her moment as the heroine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルさんどこに行くの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seere-san, where are you going?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、いかないといけません。と一人でもいこうとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to go. She tries to go alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次に動くのはマジック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next to move is Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それら釣られるように他のキャラも立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Other characters are roused as if pulled along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア　奴隷の分際で何かっこつけているのよ、リアのダーリンよ、リアが助ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria: Acting all cool like a slave, but I’m Ria’s darling, so I’ll save him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに恩をうるチャンスねとか理由づける者も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some justify it as a chance to earn favor from Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、メディウサの司令部。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Medusa’s command post.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （前回いた位置より少し下がった所に作った新設）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (A newly established post slightly behind where she was previously.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサ、アレフガルド、そして石化したランスが置かれている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa, Alefgard, and the petrified Lance are there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがメディウサ様、お見事なプランです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected of Medusa-sama, a brilliant plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、ふふふ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, hehehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このヒーロー君の彼女達、みーんな私欲しいの、強い子たくさんいるから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want all these girls of this hero guy, since many are strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遊び甲斐あるだろうしね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They should be fun to play with.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、あの時、一人か二人はさらえたかしもしれないけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though back then, maybe I could have kidnapped one or two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなは無理だったからね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But taking them all was impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、このヒーロー君をここに置いていたら、きっと来るわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But if I leave this hero guy here, surely they'll come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな娘達よ、律儀で一途だわ・・・いじめがいある。わくわく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such girls, loyal and single-minded... they’re worth teasing. Exciting!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス、西部の山脈
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth, western mountain range.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの新しい司令部がそこにあると知り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having learned that Medusa’s new command post is there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル達がやってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seere and the others arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２万の魔軍が待ち構えていた、魔物将軍は彼女らはメディウサ様の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 20,000 demon troops were waiting; the demon general ordered his troops that these girls are sacrifices for Medusa-sama.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生け贄だ、丁重にもてなすのだぞと部下に命じて居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are sacrifices—treat them carefully, he ordered his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍はシィル達に気がついても攻める事もなく、ただ山脈の道を空けて待っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the demon army notices Seere and company, they do not attack but simply keep the mountain path open and wait.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待ち構えているわね、でもいくしかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re lying in wait, but there’s no choice but to proceed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死体がいっぱい吊されている、びびる子も多数　でも行くしかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many corpses hang from the trees; many kids are frightened, but they have to move forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍　シィル達が通った後、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, after Seere and the others passed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は道を閉じる・・もう袋のネズミだ、あいつらは生きて戻れない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army blocks the path... they’re trapped like rats in a sack, no way out alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達はニタニタしている、メディウサに手を出すなとは言われているが、メディウサ様が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters grin slyly; they’ve been told not to lay hands on Medusa, but Medusa-sama...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

She tries to go alone."},{"lineNumber":252146,"originalJapaneseLine":"次に動くのはマジック","translatedEnglishLine":"Next to move is Exciting!"},{"lineNumber":252161,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス、西部の山脈","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth, western mountain range."},{"lineNumber":252162,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサの新しい司令部がそこにあると知り","translatedEnglishLine":"Having learned that Medusa’s new command post is there,"},{"lineNumber":252163,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィル達がやってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Seere and the others arrived."},{"lineNumber":252164,"originalJapaneseLine":"２万の魔軍が待ち構えていた、魔物将軍は彼女らはメディウサ様の","translatedEnglishLine":"20,000 demon troops were waiting; the demon general ordered his troops that these girls are sacrifices for Medusa-sama."},{"lineNumber":252165,"originalJapaneseLine":"生け贄だ、丁重にもてなすのだぞと部下に命じて居る","translatedEnglishLine":"They are sacrifices—treat them carefully, he ordered his subordinates."},{"lineNumber":252166,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍はシィル達に気がついても攻める事もなく、ただ山脈の道を空けて待っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Though the demon army notices Seere and company, they do not attack but simply keep the mountain path open and wait."},{"lineNumber":252167,"originalJapaneseLine":"待ち構えているわね、でもいくしかない","translatedEnglishLine":"They’re lying in wait, but there’s no choice but to proceed."},{"lineNumber":252168,"originalJapaneseLine":"死体がいっぱい吊されている、びびる子も多数　でも行くしかない","translatedEnglishLine":"Many corpses hang from the trees; many kids are frightened, but they have to move forward."},{"lineNumber":252169,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、魔軍　シィル達が通った後、","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, after Seere and the others passed,"},{"lineNumber":252170,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は道を閉じる・・もう袋のネズミだ、あいつらは生きて戻れない","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army blocks the path... they’re trapped like rats in a sack, no way out alive."},{"lineNumber":252171,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物達はニタニタしている、メディウサに手を出すなとは言われているが、メディウサ様が","translatedEnglishLine":"The monsters grin slyly; they’ve been told not to lay hands on Medusa, but Medusa-sama..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより、その後ろの女の子達、その子達も同じように元気で優秀かな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, the girls behind them—are they equally lively and talented?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽しみ、じゅるり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking forward to it, *slurp*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘は時間切れで終わります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle ends due to time running out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルドが報告、ゼスの主力部隊が迫っています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alefgard reports: Zeth's main forces are approaching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらの直衛部隊は壊滅していますので、防げません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our escort unit has been destroyed, so we cannot defend it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサ様が負ける事はありませんがお疲れになりますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa-sama will not lose, but she will get tired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはいったん引かれた方が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would be better to withdraw for now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、そうねとメディウサは引く事を決意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, yes... Medusa decides to retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ・・どれかおみあげを１つ２つと・・ランスの女達を値踏み
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then... let’s take one or two souvenirs... evaluating Lance’s women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃がすかーとランスが斬りかかる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Won’t let you escape!" Lance slashes at them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・もうとメディウサがランスを石化させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... already—Medusa turns Lance to stone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかちな子ね、あっ・・そうだ、いい事おもいついた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Impatient child, huh? Ah... I just thought of something good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス君をおみあげにしようと石化したランスを取り上げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She takes the petrified Lance, deciding to make him a souvenir.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これもらってかえって家でゆっくりと壊そうかな、うひっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I’ll take this back home and slowly break it, hehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル他が止めようとすると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Seere and others try to stop her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサは、へー　この男、案外人望があるんだ、それとももてるのかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa says, “Heh, this man surprisingly has some popularity, or maybe he’s charming.”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふーん、面白いね、ケイブリスの元に持っていくのは1週間待ってあげるよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, interesting. I’ll wait one week before taking him to Kebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつの所に持っていったら１００％すぐに壊されるからね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I take him there, he’d definitely be destroyed immediately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまでに助けたかったら、おいで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to save him by then, come to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、その子はもういらないから帰すわ。と半身不随のリズナを放り投げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I don’t need that girl anymore, so I’ll send her back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル他、リズナを介抱している所に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Seere and others are nursing Rizna,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス軍（マジック、千鶴子、毛利？）が現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Zeth army (Magic, Chizuruko, Mouri?) appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサは・・逃げられた、ランスをさらわれたって・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa: ...They escaped, and Lance was taken...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リズナはかろうじて生きているが、あまりにもひどい惨状。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rizna is barely alive, but in an extremely awful state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう二度と自立した生活は不可能、寝たきり障害者
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She will never be able to live independently again, bedridden and disabled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからどうするの・・絶望
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What do we do now... utter despair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ここからシィル視点の展開となります）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (From here, the perspective shifts to Seere.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在地の表記のみ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only the current location display.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "ゼス１／合戦２"　現在位置（マーク）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Zeth 1 / Battle 2’ Current position (marker).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス司令部に戻って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return to the Zeth command post.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを助けにいかねばとみんな思うが、リズナを見ると怖くなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone thinks we must go save Lance, but seeing Rizna frightens them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな中、シィルが率先して動く、ヒロインとして見せ場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amidst this, Seere takes the lead—her moment as the heroine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルさんどこに行くの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seere-san, where are you going?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、いかないといけません。と一人でもいこうとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to go. She tries to go alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次に動くのはマジック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next to move is Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それら釣られるように他のキャラも立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Other characters are roused as if pulled along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア　奴隷の分際で何かっこつけているのよ、リアのダーリンよ、リアが助ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria: Acting all cool like a slave, but I’m Ria’s darling, so I’ll save him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに恩をうるチャンスねとか理由づける者も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some justify it as a chance to earn favor from Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、メディウサの司令部。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Medusa’s command post.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （前回いた位置より少し下がった所に作った新設）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (A newly established post slightly behind where she was previously.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサ、アレフガルド、そして石化したランスが置かれている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa, Alefgard, and the petrified Lance are there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがメディウサ様、お見事なプランです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected of Medusa-sama, a brilliant plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、ふふふ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, hehehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このヒーロー君の彼女達、みーんな私欲しいの、強い子たくさんいるから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want all these girls of this hero guy, since many are strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遊び甲斐あるだろうしね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They should be fun to play with.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、あの時、一人か二人はさらえたかしもしれないけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though back then, maybe I could have kidnapped one or two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなは無理だったからね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But taking them all was impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、このヒーロー君をここに置いていたら、きっと来るわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But if I leave this hero guy here, surely they'll come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな娘達よ、律儀で一途だわ・・・いじめがいある。わくわく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such girls, loyal and single-minded... they’re worth teasing. Exciting!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス、西部の山脈
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth, western mountain range.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの新しい司令部がそこにあると知り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having learned that Medusa’s new command post is there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル達がやってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seere and the others arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２万の魔軍が待ち構えていた、魔物将軍は彼女らはメディウサ様の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 20,000 demon troops were waiting; the demon general ordered his troops that these girls are sacrifices for Medusa-sama.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生け贄だ、丁重にもてなすのだぞと部下に命じて居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are sacrifices—treat them carefully, he ordered his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍はシィル達に気がついても攻める事もなく、ただ山脈の道を空けて待っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the demon army notices Seere and company, they do not attack but simply keep the mountain path open and wait.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待ち構えているわね、でもいくしかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re lying in wait, but there’s no choice but to proceed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死体がいっぱい吊されている、びびる子も多数　でも行くしかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many corpses hang from the trees; many kids are frightened, but they have to move forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍　シィル達が通った後、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, after Seere and the others passed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は道を閉じる・・もう袋のネズミだ、あいつらは生きて戻れない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army blocks the path... they’re trapped like rats in a sack, no way out alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達はニタニタしている、メディウサに手を出すなとは言われているが、メディウサ様が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters grin slyly; they’ve been told not to lay hands on Medusa, but Medusa-sama...
